text.p: Here are the main headlines from Lithuania's M-1 plus radio station's noon news report on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Latvian Foreign Minister Valdis Birkavs said that Lithuania and Latvia are coming nearer to a solution over a sea border row which has soured relations.
- Deputy foreign minister Albinas Janushka urged the European Council to establish new priorities and expand the dialogue with NATO and the European Union.
